main.Query:
Declare @vchSQL nvarchar(max) Declare @bigsql nvarchar(max) set @vchSQL = 'use [' + @DBName + '] IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.objects WHERE object_id = OBJECT_ID(N''[dbo].[Fun_Targeting_GetComputedQueryHeader]'') AND type in (N''FN'', N''IF'', N''TF'', N''FS'', N''FT'')) DROP FUNCTION [dbo].[Fun_Targeting_GetComputedQueryHeader] ' exec (@vchSQL)
--************************************************** --Fun_Targeting_GetComputedQueryHeader --************************************************** Set @vchSQL ='CREATE FUNCTION [dbo].[Fun_Targeting_GetComputedQueryHeader] ( @BalanceColumnName nvarchar(100) ,@LTVPassNo nvarchar(100) ,@QueryType nvarchar(100) ,@DimPoolId bigint ,@DimECId bigint ) RETURNS nvarchar(4000) AS BEGIN
Declare @QueryReslut nvarchar(4000) = '''''''' Declare @CriteriaTableTypeCode nvarchar(100)=''''''''
Select @CriteriaTableTypeCode = CriteriaTableTypeCode From dbo.tblDimEC Where DimECID = @DimECId And DimPoolID = @DimPoolId
--**************************************************************** -- Summary Section --**************************************************************** If @QueryType = ''''SumBalanceLoan'''' Begin
Set @QueryReslut = '''' Declare @LTVPassNo nvarchar(100) = '''''''''''' + @LTVPassNo + '''''''''''' Declare @DimPoolId bigint = '''' + CONVERT(Varchar(10), @DimPoolId) + '''' Select SUM(''''+@BalanceColumnName+'''') As BalanceAmount From dbo.tblFactConsolidationLoan FCL Inner Join dbo.tblFactLoan FL On FCL.DimPoolId = FL.DimPoolId And FCL.DimLoanId = FL.DimLoanId Inner Join dbo.tblDimLoan DL on FL.DimLoanID = DL.DimLoanId and FL.DimPoolID = DL.DimPoolID Where FCL.LTVPassNo = @LTVPassNo And FCL.DimPoolID = @DimPoolId'''' End
If @QueryType = ''''SumBalanceLoanSecurity'''' Begin
Set @QueryReslut = '''' Declare @LTVPassNo nvarchar(100) = '''''''''''' + @LTVPassNo + '''''''''''' Declare @DimPoolId bigint = '''' + CONVERT(Varchar(10), @DimPoolId) + '''' Select SUM(''''+@BalanceColumnName+'''') As BalanceAmount From dbo.tblFactLoan FL Inner Join dbo.tblDimLoan DL on FL.DimLoanID = DL.DimLoanId and FL.DimPoolID = DL.DimPoolID Inner Join dbo.View_LoanMainSecurity LMS on FL.DimLoanID = LMS.DimLoanId And FL.DimPoolID = LMS.DimPoolID And LMS.LTVPassNo = @LTVPassNo Inner Join dbo.tblDimSecurity DS on DS.DimSecurityID = LMS.DimSecurityId and DS.DimPoolId = LMS.DimPoolId Where FL.DimPoolID = @DimPoolId''''
End
If @QueryType = ''''ParentSum'''' Begin Set @QueryReslut = '''' Declare @LTVPassNo nvarchar(100) = '''''''''''' + @LTVPassNo + '''''''''''' Declare @DimPoolId bigint = '''' + CONVERT(Varchar(10), @DimPoolId) + '''' Select SUM(''''+@BalanceColumnName+'''') As BalanceAmount From dbo.tblFactLoan FL Inner Join dbo.tblDimLoan DL on FL.DimLoanID = DL.DimLoanId and FL.DimPoolID = DL.DimPoolID Inner Join dbo.View_LoanMainSecurity LMS on FL.DimLoanID = LMS.DimLoanId And FL.DimPoolID = LMS.DimPoolID And LMS.LTVPassNo = @LTVPassNo Inner Join dbo.tblDimSecurity DS on DS.DimSecurityID = LMS.DimSecurityId and DS.DimPoolId = LMS.DimPoolId Where FL.DimPoolID = @DimPoolId'''' End
--**************************************************************** -- Bucketing Source --**************************************************************** If @CriteriaTableTypeCode = ''''dbo.tblFactLoanECResult'''' And @QueryType = ''''ParentSource'''' Begin
Set @QueryReslut = '''' Declare @LTVPassNo nvarchar(100) = '''''''''''' + @LTVPassNo + '''''''''''' Declare @DimPoolId bigint = '''' + CONVERT(Varchar(10), @DimPoolId) + '''' Select FL.DimLoanID As DimId , FL.LoanProportionalLTV * ''''+@BalanceColumnName+'''' As WeightedLTV , FL.Seasoning * ''''+@BalanceColumnName+'''' As WeightedSeasoning , ''''+@BalanceColumnName+'''' As BalanceAmount , FL.LoanProportionalLTV As LTV , Seasoning As Seasoning , Case When LMS.ConsolidationDimTrustId > 0 Then 1 Else 0 End As IsIgnore From dbo.tblFactLoan FL Inner Join dbo.tblDimLoan DL on FL.DimLoanID = DL.DimLoanId and FL.DimPoolID = DL.DimPoolID Inner Join dbo.View_LoanMainSecurity LMS on FL.DimLoanID = LMS.DimLoanId And FL.DimPoolID = LMS.DimPoolID And LMS.LTVPassNo = @LTVPassNo Inner Join dbo.tblDimSecurity DS on DS.DimSecurityID = LMS.DimSecurityId and DS.DimPoolId = LMS.DimPoolId Where FL.DimPoolID = @DimPoolId''''
End
If @CriteriaTableTypeCode = ''''dbo.tblFactConsolidationECResult'''' And @QueryType = ''''ParentSource'''' Begin
Set @QueryReslut = '''' Declare @LTVPassNo nvarchar(100) = '''''''''''' + @LTVPassNo + '''''''''''' Declare @DimPoolId bigint = '''' + CONVERT(Varchar(10), @DimPoolId) + '''' Select Distinct DimId , WeightedLTV , WeightedSeasoning , BalanceAmount , LTV , Seasoning , IsIgnore From dbo.View_FactConsolidation DL Join dbo.View_ConsolidationMainSecurity CMS on CMS.DimConsolidationID = DL.DimId And CMS.DimPoolId = DL.DimPoolID And CMS.LTVPassNo = DL.LTVPassNo Join dbo.tblDimSecurity DS on DS.DimSecurityID = CMS.DimSecurityId and DS.DimPoolId = CMS.DimPoolId Where DL.DimPoolID = @DimPoolId And DL.LTVPassNo = @LTVPassNo''''
End
If @QueryType = ''''WeightedLoanLTV'''' Begin
Set @QueryReslut = '''' Declare @LTVPassNo nvarchar(100) = '''''''''''' + @LTVPassNo + '''''''''''' Declare @DimPoolId bigint = '''' + CONVERT(Varchar(10), @DimPoolId) + '''' Select Sum(''''+@BalanceColumnName+'''' * FL.LoanProportionalLTV) As WeightedLoanLTV From dbo.tblFactLoan FL Join dbo.tblFactConsolidationLoan FCL on FCL.DimPoolID = FL.DimPoolID And FCL.DimLoanId = FL.DimLoanID And FCL.LTVPassNo = @LTVPassNo Where FL.DimPoolID = @DimPoolId '''' End
--**************************************************************** -- LTV Seasoning Source --**************************************************************** If @QueryType = ''''ParentSource_LTVSeasoning'''' Begin Set @QueryReslut = '''' Declare @LTVPassNo nvarchar(100) = '''''''''''' + @LTVPassNo + '''''''''''' Declare @DimPoolId bigint = '''' + CONVERT(Varchar(10), @DimPoolId) + '''' Declare @DimECId bigint = '''' + CONVERT(Varchar(10), @DimECId) + '''' Select Distinct FC.DimConsolidationID As DimId , FC.ConsolidationLTV * FC.ConsolidationBalance As WeightedLTV , FC.ConsolidationSeasoning * FC.ConsolidationBalance As WeightedSeasoning , FC.ConsolidationBalance As BalanceAmount , FC.ConsolidationLTV As LTV , FC.ConsolidationSeasoning As Seasoning , Case When FC.ConsolidationDimTrustID > 0 Then 1 Else 0 End As IsIgnore From dbo.tblFactConsolidation FC Where FC.DimPoolID = @DimPoolId And FC.LTVPassNo = @LTVPassNo And FC.DimConsolidationID Not In ( Select Distinct DimConsolidationID From dbo.tblFactConsolidationECResult Where DimECID = @DimECId And DimPoolID = @DimPoolId And LTVPassNo = @LTVPassNo ) '''' End
--**************************************************************** -- Size Source --**************************************************************** If @QueryType = ''''Size_Consolidation'''' Begin Set @QueryReslut = '''' Declare @LTVPassNo nvarchar(100) = '''''''''''' + @LTVPassNo + '''''''''''' Declare @DimPoolId bigint = '''' + CONVERT(Varchar(10), @DimPoolId) + '''' Declare @DimECId bigint = '''' + CONVERT(Varchar(10), @DimECId) + '''' Select Distinct FC.DimConsolidationID As DimId , FC.ConsolidationLTV * FC.ConsolidationBalance As WeightedLTV , FC.ConsolidationSeasoning * FC.ConsolidationBalance As WeightedSeasoning , FC.ConsolidationBalance As BalanceAmount , FC.ConsolidationLTV As LTV , FC.ConsolidationSeasoning As Seasoning , Case When FC.ConsolidationDimTrustID > 0 Then 1 Else 0 End As IsIgnore From dbo.tblFactConsolidation FC Join dbo.tblFactConsolidationLoan FCL on FCL.DimPoolID = FC.DimPoolID And FCL.DimConsolidationID = FC.DimConsolidationID And FCL.LTVPassNo = FC.LTVPassNo Where FC.DimPoolID = @DimPoolId And FC.LTVPassNo = @LTVPassNo And FCL.DimLoanID Not In ( Select Distinct DimLoanID From dbo.tblFactLoanECResult Where DimECID = @DimECId And DimPoolID = @DimPoolId ) '''' End
If @QueryType = ''''Size_Loan'''' Begin Set @QueryReslut = '''' Declare @LTVPassNo nvarchar(100) = '''''''''''' + @LTVPassNo + '''''''''''' Declare @DimPoolId bigint = '''' + CONVERT(Varchar(10), @DimPoolId) + '''' Declare @DimECId bigint = '''' + CONVERT(Varchar(10), @DimECId) + '''' Select FL.DimLoanID As DimId , FL.LoanProportionalLTV * ''''+@BalanceColumnName+'''' As WeightedLTV , FL.Seasoning * ''''+@BalanceColumnName+'''' As WeightedSeasoning , ''''+@BalanceColumnName+'''' As BalanceAmount , FL.LoanProportionalLTV As LTV , Seasoning As Seasoning , Case When FL.DimTrustID > 0 Then 1 Else 0 End As IsIgnore From dbo.tblFactConsolidation FC Join dbo.tblFactConsolidationLoan FCL on FCL.DimPoolID = FC.DimPoolID And FCL.DimConsolidationID = FC.DimConsolidationID And FCL.LTVPassNo = FC.LTVPassNo Join dbo.tblFactLoan FL on FL.DimPoolID = FCL.DimPoolID And FL.DimLoanId = FCL.DimLoanID
Where FC.DimPoolID = @DimPoolId And FC.LTVPassNo = @LTVPassNo And FL.DimLoanID Not In ( Select Distinct DimLoanID From dbo.tblFactLoanECResult Where DimECID = @DimECId And DimPoolID = @DimPoolId ) '''' End
Return @QueryReslut END ' SET @BigSQL = 'USE [' + @DBName + ']; EXEC sp_executesql N''' + @vchSQL + ''''; --PRINT @BigSQL EXEC (@BigSQL)
